name: Cartoony Cars 2
description: Cartoony Cars 2 is a physics-based puzzle game about getting the car to the flag with limited resources. When you hit "GO!" the car drives by itself. Use sticks, boostpads, portals and the (not so) realistic physics engine to guide the duck to the flag!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 650 MB available space
